summary: Adds an ability so followers can now heal during combat.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]What is it?[/b][/u]
NPCs that are equipped with this ability will gain the ability to regenerate health during combat.
There are 5 options available, with the default (i believe) of being 0.7% health regen per second.

Half - Healing rate of 0.35%
Normal - Healing rate of 0.7% (Skyrim NPC Default out of combat)
Double - Healing rate of 1.4%
Triple - Healing rate of 2.1%
Quadruple - Healing rate of 2.8%

If you want a specific rate, tell me and if i\'m nice i\'ll add it in for you.


[b][u]How to use it?[/b][/u]
Download the .esp via NMM 
--or Manual: pop it in (skyrim/Data) and activate on launch.

1. In game, open the Skyrim console (~)
2. Type: help \"PHR Combat\" 4
3. You will see each spell listed, each with its\' own ID.
4. Click on your target NPC.
5a. To give said ability, type: addspell ([i]spell ID[/i])
5b. To remove said ability, type: removespell ([i]spell ID[/i])
6. Close console (~)
7. Save game and enjoy.


[b]SEE ALSO[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44822/?]Passive Health Regeneration - Mortal Follower Fix[/url]


[b][u]Notes[/b][/u]
- This ability is not used unless added to NPC via console (or creation kit).
- This does NOT replace current regen rates, merely increases them by said amount.
- 99.99% Compatible with anything you throw with it.


[b][u]Change Log[/b][/u]

v1.00 (18/10/2013) - Initial release
